text: 1.9: Hi 9.14; 1 Zo 1.7; 2.9-11Mba tɨvi ki fhuv gumgi, mbe saman ki bigi, mbe nta gangirga tuktɨgi fhuvara, mbe rɨmgi mbatɨgi gumgi farar muuŋgip kɨrga. Khueŋ guigi guarara, Fhe Bakɨme mbe fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana nta vhɨzgim, mbe ŋgarigi. Mba khesharigi gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme mbe muuŋgi bigi, mbe nta ndɨkndɨgi ŋangi.
